column1: Uchi////I decided to try the new Houston location since they have a HH menu
column2: they call it Sake Socials (it's daily from 5-6:30pm). Overall it was a great experience. What stands out about Uchi is the combination of ingredients i.e. a sushi roll is dipped in 2 different sauce before you eat them. These ingredients you would not think would go well together turn out to be "o wow i didn't think that would go well with this but it taste so good!". I spent ~$40 from the HH menu for 2 people and that was plenty for dinner. We ordered the following:
